Package models

Class CreditCardAccount

java.lang.Object
models.BankAccount
models.CreditCardAccount
public class CreditCardAccount extends BankAccount
Midterm Project: User-defined Reference Classes, Inheritance, and Exception Handling Represents a credit card account, extending the BankAccount class. Allows users to manage charges, payments, credit limit, and cash advances.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CreditCardAccount()
    Default constructor initializing a credit card account with a default credit limit of 100,000 and no charges.
    CreditCardAccount(int accountNo, String accountName, double creditLimit, double charges)
    Parameterized constructor to initialize a credit card account with specific details.

  • Constructor Details

    • CreditCardAccount

      public CreditCardAccount()
      Default constructor initializing a credit card account with a default credit limit of 100,000 and no charges.

    • CreditCardAccount

      public CreditCardAccount(int accountNo, String accountName, double creditLimit, double charges)
      Parameterized constructor to initialize a credit card account with specific details.
      Parameters:
      accountNo - The unique account number.
      accountName - The name associated with the account.
      creditLimit - The maximum credit limit for the account.
      charges - The initial charges on the credit card.
